attributes.action: To do the honourable thing and compensate the hard working British people whom have suffered loss of their occupational pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair when Government workers have guarenteed pensions paid for out of taxation. Yet private workers loose all, due to no fault of their own. In these circumstances the well being of these people is the responsibilty of the state.

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions already with similar themes
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
